author: nhcwebmaster@noaa.gov (NHC Webmaster)
nhc_headline: ...PRISCILLA OFF THE COAST OF BAJA CALIFORNIA SUR... ...INCREASED RISK OF FLOODING ACROSS THE U.S. SOUTHWEST DURING THE NEXT FEW DAYS...
summary: ...PRISCILLA OFF THE COAST OF BAJA CALIFORNIA SUR... ...INCREASED RISK OF FLOODING ACROSS THE U.S. SOUTHWEST DURING THE NEXT FEW DAYS... As of 11:00 PM MST Wed Oct 08 the center of Priscilla was located near 23.2, -113.9 with movement NW at 9 mph. The minimum central pressure was 989 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 60 mph.

title: Summary - Tropical Storm Priscilla (EP1/EP162025)
